access.title: Access Wallet
access.desc: Access an existing wallet using private key or a key file.

create.title: Create New Wallet
create.desc: Create a new wallet to store your assets
create.warning: Do not lose your private key! If you do you won't be able to access your wallet and funds again. There is no way to recover lost keys.

transfer.title: Send Transaction
transfer.no_cash: You must have an asset in your wallet to issue a transaction.

paper.title: Scan Paper Wallet
paper.desc: Scan the private key from a paper wallet to add to your managed key pairs.

export.title: Export Wallet
export.desc: Download your keys in a password encrypted file.

import.title: Import Wallet
import.desc: Upload a key file to use within your wallet.

assets.title: Assets
assets.empty: You do not have any assets.

keys.title: Manage Keys
keys.empty: This address does not have any assets in it.
keys.del_check: Are you sure you want to delete this key and address from your wallet? You will not be able to use the funds associated with it anymore.
